text:
Juliet (frrom inside): How I love to hate Romeo. He is a mouse and I am a viper. After I lure him further and further into my grasp, we can strike. The Montagues are the scum of the earth. Romeo has a beautiful face but a terrible heart. He was born into the wrong family, and for that he must pay.
Nurse: Its not long now, is it?
Juliet: No. Not long nowâ€¦ and then the end of the Capulets can begin! *Breaks out into an evil cackle*
